snippet: The luxury home builder increased in its fiscal third quarter as it delivered more homes and average sales prices rose.
abstract: Toll Brothers reports net income for fiscal third quarter of $97.7 million, or 53 cents a share, up from $46.6 million, or 26 cents a share, in year-ago period; revenue for the period rose 53 percent, to $1.06 billion from $689.2 million.
lead_paragraph: The luxury home builder increased in its fiscal third quarter as it delivered more homes and average sales prices rose.

headline.main: Profit at Toll Brothers More Than Doubles
headline.print_headline: Profit at Toll Brothers More Than Doubles
